00029 #ifndef __GLES2HardwareBufferManager_H__
00030 #define __GLES2HardwareBufferManager_H__
00031 
00032 #include "OgreGLES2Prerequisites.h"
00033 #include "OgreHardwareBufferManager.h"
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre {
00036     // Default threshold at which glMapBuffer becomes more efficient than glBufferSubData (32k?)
00037     #   define OGRE_GL_DEFAULT_MAP_BUFFER_THRESHOLD (1024 * 32)
00038 
00040     class _OgreGLES2Export GLES2HardwareBufferManagerBase : public HardwareBufferManagerBase
00041     {
00042         protected:
00043             char* mScratchBufferPool;
00044             OGRE_MUTEX(mScratchMutex)
00045             size_t mMapBufferThreshold;
00046 
00047         public:
00048             GLES2HardwareBufferManagerBase();
00049             virtual ~GLES2HardwareBufferManagerBase();
00051             HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr createVertexBuffer(size_t vertexSize,
00052                 size_t numVerts, HardwareBuffer::Usage usage, bool useShadowBuffer = false);
00054             HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr createIndexBuffer(
00055                 HardwareIndexBuffer::IndexType itype, size_t numIndexes,
00056                 HardwareBuffer::Usage usage, bool useShadowBuffer = false);
00058             RenderToVertexBufferSharedPtr createRenderToVertexBuffer();
00059 
00061             static GLenum getGLUsage(unsigned int usage);
00062 
00064             static GLenum getGLType(unsigned int type);
00065 
00073             void* allocateScratch(uint32 size);
00074 
00076             void deallocateScratch(void* ptr);
00077 
00080             size_t getGLMapBufferThreshold() const;
00081             void setGLMapBufferThreshold( const size_t value );
00082     };
00083 
00085     class _OgreGLES2Export GLES2HardwareBufferManager : public HardwareBufferManager
00086     {
00087     public:
00088         GLES2HardwareBufferManager()
00089             : HardwareBufferManager(OGRE_NEW GLES2HardwareBufferManagerBase()) 
00090         {
00091 
00092         }
00093         ~GLES2HardwareBufferManager()
00094         {
00095             OGRE_DELETE mImpl;
00096         }
00097 
00099         static GLenum getGLUsage(unsigned int usage) 
00100             { return GLES2HardwareBufferManagerBase::getGLUsage(usage); }
00101 
00103         static GLenum getGLType(unsigned int type)
00104             { return GLES2HardwareBufferManagerBase::getGLType(type); }
00105 
00113         void* allocateScratch(uint32 size)
00114         {
00115             return static_cast<GLES2HardwareBufferManagerBase*>(mImpl)->allocateScratch(size);
00116         }
00117 
00119         void deallocateScratch(void* ptr)
00120         {
00121             static_cast<GLES2HardwareBufferManagerBase*>(mImpl)->deallocateScratch(ptr);
00122         }
00123 
00126         size_t getGLMapBufferThreshold() const
00127         {
00128             return static_cast<GLES2HardwareBufferManagerBase*>(mImpl)->getGLMapBufferThreshold();
00129         }
00130         void setGLMapBufferThreshold( const size_t value )
00131         {
00132             static_cast<GLES2HardwareBufferManagerBase*>(mImpl)->setGLMapBufferThreshold(value);
00133         }
00134 
00135     };
